items.text_for_match: 'If Flick hadn't come, I would have left Barca' - Raphinha Raphinha has become one of Barcelona's most dependable performers and a decisive figure in their biggest matches, which he credits Hansi Flick for. Raphinha has become one of Barcelona's most dependable performers and a decisive figure in their biggest matches, which he credits Hansi Flick for.

items.ja: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside?
items.en: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside?
items.text_for_match: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside? Is the offside law about to change to Arsene Wenger's daylight idea? And should football make that change just because of VAR? Is the offside law about to change to Arsene Wenger's daylight idea? And should football make that change just because of VAR?

items.text_for_match: Tottenham sign Gallagher from Atletico for £35m The former Chelsea midfielder joins Spurs on a deal until 2031. The former Chelsea midfielder joins Spurs on a deal until 2031.

items.ja: Spurs sporting director Paratici to join Fiorentina
items.en: Spurs sporting director Paratici to join Fiorentina
items.text_for_match: Spurs sporting director Paratici to join Fiorentina Tottenham Hotspur sporting director Fabio Paratici will leave Spurs at the end of the January transfer window to join Serie A side Fiorentina. Tottenham Hotspur sporting director Fabio Paratici will leave Spurs at the end of the January transfer window to join Serie A side Fiorentina.

items.ja: What is it like to be a caretaker manager?
items.en: What is it like to be a caretaker manager?
items.text_for_match: What is it like to be a caretaker manager? BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains what life is like as a caretaker boss after Michael Carrick's appointment at Manchester United, with Neil Warnock and Phil Brown detailing their experiences. BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains what life is like as a caretaker boss after Michael Carrick's appointment at Manchester United, with Neil Warnock and Phil Brown detailing their experiences.

items.ja: Wolves FA Cup win attributed to Pope's prayer
items.en: Wolves FA Cup win attributed to Pope's prayer
items.text_for_match: Wolves FA Cup win attributed to Pope's prayer Lifelong fan Jim Sharma pays a visit to Pope Leo XIV and gifts him a Wolverhampton Wanderers shirt. Lifelong fan Jim Sharma pays a visit to Pope Leo XIV and gifts him a Wolverhampton Wanderers shirt.

items.en: Why Alonso's reign is over at Real Madrid
items.text_for_match: Why Alonso's reign is over at Real Madrid After Xabi Alonso's departure as Real Madrid manager, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks into where it all went wrong.
